items.name: case defaultRenderingMode
items.desc: Determines the actual mode based on the user preference settings.

items.name: case antialiasedRenderingMode
items.desc: Specifies antialiased, floating-point advancements rendering mode (synonymous with printerFont).

items.name: case antialiasedIntegerAdvancementsRenderingMode
items.desc: Specifies antialiased, integer advancements rendering mode.
